name: RPGGeek/BoardGameGeek/VideoGameGeek
description: A style to improve readability on the RPGGeek, BoardGameGeek, and VideoGameGeek sites. While the site redesign is going on, this style may change frequently.
additional_info:
1. Shorten line lengths in article divs
  2. Widen the left-hand column (Quickbar, recently-viewed items, Hotlist)
  3. Make article borders thicker
  4. Give articles and quoted text a darker background colour
  5. Increase font size in articles (and quoted text)
  6. Use monospaced font in form text areas (to make wiki formatting codes easier to read)
  7. Add padding at the top of microbadges
